channel.title: [317] Help Connecting please, its basically Ignorance
channel.description: I know this may not make sense to many.. but i am used to coding the dinosaur moparscape servers like pimpscape and cheesescape im looking to move onto 317 but im confused i've looked all around, search button, and it seems like its just common knowledge and ive missed it How do you connect yourself through a 317 like i have downloaded peoples sources + client but i'm confused past there. Like is there a webclient i can just put my ip in and connect like the old? or is there a client i have to make for myself? Like i said im sorry if this is just basic knowledge and a wasite of a post but i can't find it anywhere basicaly my main question is if i have a 317 source and im ready to code it how the heck do i connect to it? Thanks

item.title: [317] Help Connecting please, its basically Ignorance
item.dc:creator: @leon30003 leon30003
item.description:
@leon30003 wrote:

So i just make sure that any ip that appears is the 127.0.0 or whatever?
becuase if so i should just be able to download any
old client and source
and just use vista’s search to find it easy.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Help Connecting please, its basically Ignorance
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

I have no recommendations, sorry. Most clients have the option, if not, you have to find it in the Client’s files.

item.title: [317] Help Connecting please, its basically Ignorance
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

Use the IP 127.0.0.1, that is also “localhost”, which works when on your own computer. You must run the server before the client, mind you.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Help Connecting please, its basically Ignorance

item.title: [317] Help Connecting please, its basically Ignorance
item.dc:creator: @leon30003 leon30003
item.description:
@leon30003 wrote:

I know this may not make sense to many…
but i am used to coding the dinosaur moparscape servers
like pimpscape
and cheesescape
im looking to move onto 317
but im confused
i’ve looked all around, search button,
and it seems like its just common knowledge and ive missed it
How do you connect yourself through a 317
like i have downloaded peoples sources + client
but i’m confused past there.
Like is there a webclient i can just put my ip in and connect like the old?
or is there a client i have to make for myself?
Like i said im sorry if this is just basic knowledge and a wasite of a post
but i can’t find it anywhere
basicaly my main question is
if i have a 317 source and im ready to code it
how the heck do i connect to it?
Thanks
